text: nihsandeh, jo eemaan laaye tatha hijarat (parasthaan) kar gaye aur allaah kee raah mein apane dhanon aur praanon se jihaad kiye tatha jin logon ne unhen sharan diya tatha sahaayata kee, vahee ek-doosare ke sahaayak hain aur jo eemaan nahin laaye aur na hijarat (parasthaan) kee, unase tumhaaree sahaayata ka koee sambandh nahin, yahaan tak ki hijarat karake aa jaayen aur yadi ve dharm ke baaren mein tumase sahaayata maangen, to tumapar unakee sahaayata karana aavashyak hai. parantu kisee aisee jaati ke virudhd nahin, jinake aur tumhaare beech sandhi ho tatha tum jo kuchh kar rahe ho, use allaah dekh raha hai
